## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the [WordPress Coding Standards](https://developer.wordpress.org/coding-standards/wordpress-coding-standards/)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new PHP warnings or notices

### Security
- [ ] I have verified no new XSS vulnerabilities are introduced
- [ ] User input is properly sanitized and validated
- [ ] Capability checks are in place where required
- [ ] Nonces are used where appropriate

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated PHPDoc comments for any changed functions
- [ ] I have updated the README if applicable
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md

### Internationalization
- [ ] All user-facing strings are wrapped in translation functions (`__()`, `esc_html__()`, etc.)
- [ ] Text domain `scriptomatic` is used consistently

### Backwards Compatibility
- [ ] This change is backwards compatible with WordPress 5.0+
- [ ] This change is backwards compatible with PHP 7.2+
